mapper.sql: fil_up.id AS "id", fil_up.file_name AS "fileName", fil_up.file_type AS "fileType", fil_up.file_size AS "fileSize", fil_up.file_content_type AS "fileContentType", fil_up.file_content AS "fileContent", fil_up.secure_level AS "secureLevel"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file_upload ( id, file_name, file_type, file_size, file_content_type, file_content, secure_level ) values( #{id}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, #{fileContentType}, #{fileContent}, #{secureLevel} )
